content.en: Optimizing PID Controllers: Researchers have explored various algorithms to optimize the parameters of PID controllers for speed control of DC motors. These algorithms include NSGA-II, MACODE, GA, PSO, DE, improved ant colony, opposition based ABC, multi-objective genetic algorithm, hybrid Lévy flight distribution and Nelder-Mead, modified camel, Archimedes optimization algorithm, dispersive flies optimization, particle swarm optimization, and metaheuristic algorithms. The goal is to find the most effective algorithm for tuning PID controllers and improving the speed control of DC motors.
content.da: Optimering af PID-regulatorer: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at optimere parametrene i PID-regulatorer til hastighedskontrol af jævnstrømsmotorer. Disse algoritmer omfatter NSGA-II, MACODE, GA, PSO, DE, forbedret myrekoloni, opposition baseret ABC, multi-mål genetisk algoritme, hybrid Lévy flyvningsfordeling og Nelder-Mead, modificeret kamel, Archimedes optimeringsalgoritme, dispersive flies optimering, partikel sværm optimering og metaheuristiske algoritmer. Målet er at finde den mest effektive algoritme til at indstille PID-regulatorer og forbedre hastighedskontrollen af jævnstrømsmotorer.
